attributes.action: force the release of details relating to the high court torture case of Binyam Mohamed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The US government has advised judges that if details of this case are published they could then "inflict on the citizens of the United Kingdom a very considerable increase in the dangers they face at a time when a serious terrorist threat still pertains". Regardless of any allegations against Binyam Mohamed; As a UK citizen, please show that you will not stand for threats such as this.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Judiciary.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
